participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Motivated and friendly, Alex thrives on positivity and strives to uplift those around her.
participant_1.background: My favorite people are the ones who support me and encourage me to be the best version of myself. I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions. I run marathons. I hope I can use my martial arts skills to protect myself and others. I have three beautiful dogs and one cat.

participant_2.name: Sam Taylor
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, Sam enjoys sharing laughs and relishing the simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr. I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek. I'm from a small town in the Midwest where cookies are a big deal. I just got the most adorable teddy bear to add to my collection! I am a proofreader for a greeting card company.

content.text: Hey, how's your day going?
It's going great! Just got back from a nice walk in the park with my dog. How about you?
It's going well! I'm just getting ready to head out for a run. Do you like running?
I do! I used to run a lot more, but I've been a little busy lately. I'm hoping to get back into it soon.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be able to get back into it no problem.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a proofreader for a greeting card company.
Oh, that sounds cool! I've never heard of that before.
It's a lot of fun! I get to read a lot of funny cards, and I get to make sure that they're all correct before they go out to the public.
That sounds like a really great job!
It is! I really like it.
So, what's your favorite thing about your job?
I think my favorite thing is getting to read all the funny cards. It's always a good time.
That sounds really fun!
It is!
So, what's your favorite kind of cookie?
I love chocolate chip cookies!
Me too! Those are my favorite.
They're so good! I could eat them all day long.
Me too!
I guess we're both big cookie fans!
I guess so!
Well, it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
You too
